name: wc-polymer-stencil-todo
description: Comparison on how to update DOM, pass attributes/properties and dispatch/listen to events with Web Components

scripts.build:slimjs: cd slim-js && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/slimjs && mv dist ../dist/slimjs
scripts.build:native: cd native-shadow-dom && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/native && mkdir ../dist/native && mv dist ../dist/native && cp index.html ../dist/native
scripts.build:lit-element:0.6: cd lit-element-0.6 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/lit-element-0.6 && mkdir ../dist/lit-element-0.6 && mv dist ../dist/lit-element-0.6 && cp index.html ../dist/lit-element-0.6
scripts.build:lit-element:2.1: cd lit-element-2.1 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/lit-element-2.1 && mkdir ../dist/lit-element-2.1 && mv dist ../dist/lit-element-2.1 && cp index.html ../dist/lit-element-2.1
scripts.build:polymer2: cd polymer2 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/polymer2 && mv build/es6-bundled ../dist/polymer2
scripts.build:polymer3: cd polymer3 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/polymer3 && mv build/es6-bundled ../dist/polymer3
scripts.build:angular-elements: cd angular-elements && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/angular-elements && mv dist ../dist/angular-elements
scripts.build:angular: cd non-web-components-refs/angular && npm run build && rm -fr ../../dist/angular && mv dist/angular ../../dist/angular
scripts.build:react: cd non-web-components-refs/react && npm run build && rm -fr ../../dist/react && mv build ../../dist/react
scripts.build:vue: cd non-web-components-refs/vue && npm run build && rm -fr ../../dist/vue && mv dist ../../dist/vue
scripts.build:vue-elements: cd vue && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/vue-elements && mv dist ../dist/vue-elements
scripts.build:skatejs:lit-html: cd skatejs-lit-html && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && mkdir ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && mv dist ../dist/skatejs-lit-html && cp index.html ../dist/skatejs-lit-html
scripts.build:skatejs:preact: cd skatejs-preact && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/skatejs-preact && mkdir ../dist/skatejs-preact && mv dist ../dist/skatejs-preact && cp index.html ../dist/skatejs-preact
scripts.build:stencil:0.11: cd stencil-0.11 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/stencil-0.11 && mv www ../dist/stencil-0.11
scripts.build:stencil:0.16: cd stencil-0.16 && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/stencil-0.16 && mv www ../dist/stencil-0.16
scripts.build:svelte: cd svelte && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/svelte && cp -R public ../dist/svelte
scripts.build:atomico: cd atomico && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/atomico && cp -R public ../dist/atomico
scripts.build:functional-element: cd functional-element && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/functional-element && cp -R public ../dist/functional-element
scripts.build:solid: cd solid && npm run build && rm -fr ../dist/solid && cp -R public ../dist/solid

author: shprink <julien.renaux@gmail.com>
